tool_description: Find a postcode for a geo coordinate and also find the geo coordinate for a postcode
name: Locations and Postcodes UK
title: Locations and Postcodes UK

api_list.name: getDistanceBetweenPostcodes
api_list.description: Calculate the distance between two postcodes in the UK. It will return the distance in meters and miles.

api_list.name: getLocationForPostcode
api_list.description: Send a postcode in the UK and it will return the nearest geo coordinate

api_list.name: getPostcodeForLocation
api_list.description: Send a latitude and a longitude in the UK and it will return the nearest postcode
